content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 21), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "現在の状況では、敵空母の位置を特定するために航空部隊を発艦させる必要があります。空母BC1の視界範囲は4ヘクスであり、航空部隊の発艦範囲は22ヘクスです。敵空母は左上のランダム位置にいるため、まずは北西方向に航空部隊を発艦させ、敵空母を索敵することを目指します。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 21}, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 10}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (10, 10) while at (19, 20).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 21), en route to target (19, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 20), outbound toward (10, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "航空部隊BSQ1は現在(19, 20)から(10, 10)に向かって進行中です。次のターンで目標地点に到達するため、敵空母を発見できる可能性が高まります。BC1は現在の位置を維持し、BSQ1の索敵をサポートします。BSQ2はまだ発艦していないため、BSQ1の状況を見てから発艦を検討します。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 21), en route to target (19, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 16), outbound toward (10, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "航空部隊BSQ1は現在(17, 16)に位置しており、目標地点(10, 10)に向かっています。次のターンで目標に到達し、敵空母を発見できるかどうかが重要です。BC1は引き続き位置を維持し、BSQ1の索敵をサポートします。BSQ2はまだ発艦していないため、BSQ1の結果を見てから発艦を検討します。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 13) while at (14, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (10, 13) while at (14, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (12, 13) (previously at (11, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (10, 13) (previously at (10, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 21), en route to target (19, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 13), outbound toward (10, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "航空部隊BSQ1は敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2を発見しました。これにより、敵空母の位置を推測する手がかりが得られました。BSQ1は敵航空部隊に攻撃を仕掛けることができるため、次のターンで攻撃を行うべきです。BC1は位置を維持し、BSQ2の発艦を準備します。BSQ2は次のターンで発艦し、索敵を続けることが重要です。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 21}, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 13}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 14) while at (12, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (11, 10) while at (11, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (11, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (10, 13) while at (19, 20).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 10) (previously at (10, 10)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 14) (previously at (11, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (13, 15) (previously at (10, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 21), en route to target (19, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 11), engaging an enemy target at (11, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 20), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "航空部隊BSQ1は敵空母AC1を発見し、攻撃を開始しています。これにより、敵空母を撃沈するチャンスがあります。BSQ2は(10, 13)に向かって進行中ですが、BSQ1の攻撃状況を見守りつつ、次の行動を決定する必要があります。BC1は位置を維持し、BSQ1の攻撃をサポートします。BSQ2は次のターンで発艦し、敵の動きを監視することが重要です。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:

- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 23 damage while at (11, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 16) while at (11, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 11) while at (11, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (16, 17) while at (17, 16).

- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (16, 17) (previously at (10, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 21), en route to target (19, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 17/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 16), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "航空部隊BSQ1は敵空母AC1に対して23のダメージを与え、現在帰投中です。AC1のHPは70/100となり、引き続き攻撃のチャンスがあります。BSQ2は敵航空部隊ASQ2を発見しましたが、BSQ1が帰投するまで攻撃を控えます。BC1はBSQ1の帰投を待ちながら、次の行動を決定します。BSQ1が帰投した後、再度発艦して敵空母を攻撃する準備をします。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "航空部隊BSQ1は敵空母AC1を発見し、攻撃のチャンスがあります。BSQ2もAC1に向かって進行中です。BSQ1は帰投中ですが、次のターンで再発艦し、AC1に攻撃を仕掛ける準備をします。BC1はBSQ1の帰投を待ちながら、BSQ2の進行をサポートします。BSQ2がAC1に到達した場合、攻撃を行うべきです。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 21}, "launch_target": {"x": 12, "y": 10}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
